archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0986
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Billing specialist, we need the ability to be able to provide the Vodafone finance team with a view of additional information in relation to services on an account (e.g a project code in the case of a large BNZ project to be able to account for internal costs). This additional information would not be printed on the invoice but associated to the service

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
